content: Wear your learning like your watch, in a private pocket; and do not pull it out and strike it, merely to show that you have one.
translations: ita:Indossa il tuo sapere come il tuo orologio in una tasca privataï¹• non estrarlo e non scuoterlo soltanto per far vedere ch
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Adelpa (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
